name: Vintage Retro Metal Lawn Chair U-Pick the Color ... "The Metropolis"
description:
Super Classic Manufacturing presents . . .
"The Metropolis" VINTAGE LAWN CHAIR
Colors: RED, YELLOW, GREEN, WHITE, TORQUISE, PINK Seat & Back with White Frame
Retro Styling from that great 1950's era of Solid Workmanship, Nostalgic Styling, and USA Craftsmanship.

Recapture  treasured  memories of summer evenings spent outdoors with family, friends, and relatives with this Classic Retor Vintage 1950's Style Metal Lawn Chairs.  This classic design of vintage patio furniture has become timeless and highly desirable. Retro 1950's Style Metal Lawn Chairs take us back to the comforts and charm of Grandma's back porch while allowing us to remain stylishly contemporary.   The chairs are available in ten vibrant colors, you are sure to find a hue that delights your fancy and suits your unique style. (EMAIL OR ASK FOR OTHER COLORS)  A powder coated finish and stainless steel hardware resist rusting &  fading.  They are well-suited for year-round outdoor use.
Powder Coated Hybrid Finishes  Stainless Steel Hardware  Kwik Assembly in about a quarter of an hour

name: Handmade RETRO-FUTURE Designer Handbag & Tote STEEL & LEATHER
description:
The Authentic Objectivist Styled . . 
Tote Bag from Atlas Shrugged
 ... made with the patented techno-modern Rearden Metal
Retails in specialty shops at: $175 ... limited edition 2011 collection
  
Modern Art meets practicality in this objectively designed tote bag influenced by Atlas Shrugged.
Light weight and high strength aluminum (patented Rearden Metal) and leather materials are hand assembled with inustrial strength rivets. Superior craftsmanship in this classic handmade product. Can be used as a handbag, totebag, rack, home decor, etcetera. Available in your customized choice of colors. Shown in Titanium. Other standard colors: Gunmetal, Black Carbide, Ivory, Ebony, Mahogony, Rust ... customization available. Made in the USA with homegrown and manmade materials ... just like ma and pa us'ta use.

Hand Made.  Shipping & Handling costs include all fees, postage, delivery.

name: Steel & Color Wall Shelves by Waveform Plodes Design (four per set)
description:
Plodes - Waveform

The Waveform by Plodes is a shelving system made of flat sheet metal, the shelving units seem to defy its own property by reaching out to hold your objects. Installation hardware is nearly invisible as a sliding rail system is welded to the flanges of the shelving with its counterpart properly spaced and attached to the wall. As the shelf is a modular 'tile', one has creative freedom to install.

Size: 22”L x 13”D x 17.5”H
Materials: Flat Sheet Metal, Powder Coated.
Includes: Mounting Brackets.

Gloss Powder-coat Colors: Sky White, Aero Yellow, Safety Orange, Red Baron, Bike Black, Evergreen, Blue Streak ll.
Satin Powder-coat Colors: Cool Grey1, Warm Grey2, Silveradillo, Statuary Bronze, Patrician Bronze ... see color spectrum chart
